name: Kunal Bharadwaj
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

full_output.summary: As a Technology graduate, I'm ready to transition from academia to the dynamic world of technology and engineering. My journey has been fueled by curiosity and a deep passion for tech. Throughout my academic career, I've honed problem-solving skills vital in the fast-paced tech industry, from coding complex algorithms to collaborating in diverse teams. I'm now eager to apply my knowledge and fresh perspective to real-world innovative projects.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: COMPUTER ASSISTANT
projects.description: Developed a assistant to handle tasks and perform actions using text to text speech technology.

projects.name: NEWS ASSISTANT
projects.description: This is a voice control news assistant. When we ask about such popular topics, it will show us trending headlines from all over the world.

projects.name: HOTSTAR CLONE
projects.description: This clone is very similar to the original disney plus website. It is only one page(homepage) website. It has navbar and search box with cool click effect same as disney+.

full_output.name: Kunal Bharadwaj
achievements_and_awards: Attained the first position in my class in the fourth semester.

Won the Gold Medal in the Young Scientist Talent Test - Science Olympiad by Sri Chaitanya Educational Institutions and Uniglobal Technologies Inc., highlighting my dedication to scientific exploration and problem-solving.
Secured second rank in the national-level Hindi language competition by Rashtrabhasha Sabha, Pune, showcasing my appreciation for linguistic diversity and cultural heritage.
